description:
Big performance in a small package. The performance synthetic fabric blend lets the Cross over tab socks breathe well and wick away moisture, so you can focus on the run. Lightweight cushioning provides protection while engineered arch support holds you up.

  • Synthetic and cotton blend give you quick drying stability kilometre after kilometre
  • Infiknit™ gives durability to the sock for long lasting comfort
  • Mapped cushioning provides softness where you need it
  • Feel360® technology wicks away moisture to keep your feet dry
  • Breathable mesh lets heat out to help your feet stay cool
  • Left/right engineered arch support delivers a precise fit
name: Stance Cross Over Tab Socks - Unisex
